import React, { useState } from 'react' const Login = () => { let [user, setUser] = useState({ name: '', email: '', mobileno: '', password: '', dob: '', gender: '' }) let [message, setMessage] = useState({}) let [btnDisable, setBtnDisable] = useState("") const handleChangeEvent = (e, field) => { let fieldValue = e.target.value setUser({ ...user, [field]: fieldValue }) console.log(user) } const handleSubmitEvent = e => { e.preventDefault() } const validate = ()=>{ if (user.name.length === 0) { setMessage({ ...message, name: "Name Required" }) } return } return (
handleChangeEvent(e, 'name')} />
{message.name}
handleChangeEvent(e, 'email')} />
{message.email}
handleChangeEvent(e, 'mobile')} />
{message.mobileno}
handleChangeEvent(e, 'password')} />
{message.password}
handleChangeEvent(e, 'dob')} />
{message.dob}

handleChangeEvent(e, 'gender')} /> Male   handleChangeEvent(e, 'gender')} /> Female
{message.gender}
) } export default Login;
